title: Virgin Beach Relaxation (Half-day)
overview: Enjoy the seclusion and crystal clear waters of Virgin Beach, also known as White Sandy Beach, perfect for swimming and sunbathing.

stops.description: Arrive and relax on the white sand, swim, or snorkel in the clear water.
Lunch at a local warung with ocean views.

title: Virgin Beach & Coral Reefs (Full-day)
overview: A full day of relaxation and underwater adventure at Virgin Beach, featuring snorkeling, coral reefs, and time to unwind.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy swimming, snorkeling, or exploring the coral reefs.
Free time for sunbathing, swimming, or beachcombing.
